org.emboss.jemboss.server
Class TestPrivateServer

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--org.emboss.jemboss.server.TestPrivateServer
public class TestPrivateServer
extends java.lang.Object

This can be used to test the private server. It is run from the command line and requires the username, password and a sequence file as input: java org.emboss.jemboss.server.TestPrivateServer username passwd app ~/pax.msf If it connects correctly to the server it will run an emboss application, and return the output. This works with 'cons' and 'seqret'.
